meta.Summary:: MAIB report on the investigation into the structural failure and foundering of the general cargo ship Swanland in the Irish Sea with the loss of six crew on 27 November 2011. Report No 12/2013. Published 12 June 2013.

title: Accident Investigation Report 12/2013
raw_html:
Report name:

Swanland
Incident date:
27 November 2011
Category:
Merchant vessels
Summary:
MAIB report on the investigation into the structural failure and foundering of the general cargo ship Swanland in the Irish Sea with the loss of six crew on 27 November 2011. Report No 12/2013. Published 12 June 2013.

body:
MAIB report on the investigation into the structural failure and foundering of the general cargo ship Swanland in the Irish Sea with the loss of six crew on 27 November 2011. Report No 12/2013. Published 12 June 2013.

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (6,051.24 kb) 

[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET1) (9,318.48 kb)

[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET2) (6,808.17 kb)

Two Safety Flyers were also produced for this incident and can be viewed on our website:  
[Read Safety Flyer - Six crew lost as a general cargo ship founders](http://maib.gov.uk/publications/accident_flyers/accident_flyers_2013/swanland_flyer.cfm)

  
[Read Safety flyer - Catastrophic structural failure of a general cargo vessel](http://maib.gov.uk/publications/accident_flyers/accident_flyers_2013/swanland_flyer_2.cfm)
